name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Naya Tab - A new tab extension by sharadcodes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab extension developed by Sharad Raj Singh Maurya who lives in India building useful things for the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This new tab extension adds functionality similar to the brave browser's new tab page.

You can:
* Add shortcuts to websites.
* Change wallpaper for new tab page.

If you like this extension and want to support me then you can do so using:

* Github Sponsors: https://github.com/sponsors/sharadcodes
* INDIANS can use UPI ID: iamsharadraj@okaxis
